flavor: There is an imposter among us.

text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Imp. Transform into a copy of it.

flavor: We didn't start the fire!

flavor: Whoops, typo!

text: Discover a friendly minion to resurrect and give it Rush. It dies at the end of turn.

flavor: Every totem is evidence of a tree's murder.
name: Totemic Evidence
text: Choose a basic Totem and summon it. Infuse (3 Totems): Summon all 4 instead.

flavor: The Soul Seeker's job is to look for a snitch.
name: Soul Seeker
text: Battlecry: Swap this with a random minion from your opponent's deck.

flavor: "Who put these beans in my pocket?!" -Man With Beans in Pocket
name: Framester

flavor: "Sire, this is a Sindy's."
name: Objection!

flavor: Does "Justice is Blind" still apply with Spectral Sight?
name: Sightless Magistrate

flavor: This Shadehound wasn't just a good boy. He was the best.
name: Shadehound
text: [x]Whenever this attacks, give your other Beasts +2/+2. Infuse (3 Beasts): Gain Rush.

flavor: DO NOT PASS GO. DO NOT COLLECT 200 GOLD.
name: Motion Denied

flavor: "Your Honor, my client was simply trying a new tree trimming technique!"

flavor: Maybe we should have made the bars closer together…
name: All Fel Breaks Loose

flavor: Also sentenced to laugh and love.
name: Life Sentence
text:
Remove a minion
from the game.

flavor: "Your Honor. The Defense isn't a clown, he's the whole circus."
name: Prosecutor Mel'tranix
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent can only play their left- and right-most cards on their next turn.

Silver Hand Recruits.

flavor: A truly staggering 180 scribbles per minute!
name: Scribbling Stenographer

flavor: Do you swear to give the buff, the whole buff, and nothing but the buff, so help you Kyrestia?
name: Clear Conscience

flavor: Good news: He knows Kazakus's secret identity! Bad news: Now he's here.

flavor: Honey, where are my paaaaaaants?

the opponent.

flavor: When the going gets tough, you don't want a criminal lawyer... you want a criminal lawyer...

flavor: To Blizzard jail with you!
name: Incarceration

flavor: Don't worry, there is a chair for you to sit in. It's very misleading.

flavor: Bailiff, bring in the dancing lobsters!

flavor: "Yes, Your Honor, this appears to be some sort of blade."

flavor: Why is it a common? Well we couldn't make it a LEGendary minion!

flavor: AH! Wrist cramp!
name: Afterlife Attendant

flavor: People keep asking for her award-winning vegetarian chili recipe, but she just can't spill the beans.

flavor: Turns into 'Sylvanas, the Infused'.

flavor: At one point, The Jailer served as Arbiter over the souls of the Shadowlands. He was the epitome of an unbiased, righteous judge of character. WAS.

flavor: This document looks illegally binding.
name: Contract Conjurer
text: Costs (3) less for each Secret you control.

flavor: Side effects may include feeling totally fine! Don't even worry about it.
name: Suspicious Alchemist

flavor: "Oh please, let me take your jacket, luggage, and absurdly large shoulder pads."

flavor: EVERY party should be a costume party.

flavor: "Ah, permission shmermission! You can borrow anything you want, anytime, as long as if you give it back before it's missed. Everyone knows that! Right?"

flavor: "I SAW THEM VENT, I SWEAR!"

flavor: He's got gill-ty written all over him!

flavor: "It's party time! P-A-R-T-Why? Because I gotta!"

flavor: There are many things not called poison which can kill a man. But in this case, it is poison.

if you dealt 3 or more

flavor: The imps end you, and the cats... well, they astrophe.

flavor: "You know what we need? Some rope." "That's stupid. Name one thing you'd need a rope for."

name: Serrated Bone Spike
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a 
minion. If it dies, your 
next card this turn 
costs (2) less.

flavor: We originally planned on giving Rogue a Legendary minion called "The Moon", but SOMEONE jumped in the frame.
name: Necrolord Draka
text: [x]Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Dagger. (+1 Attack for each other card you played this turn, up to 10!)

flavor: Holds Sire Denathrius' most prized possession - his teddy bear, Jeremy Bearimy.
name: Relic Vault
text: The next Relic you play this turn casts twice.

flavor: Xy'mox chuckled. "You mean the Chaos Emerald?"
name: Relic of Phantasms
text:
Summon two 1/1
Spirits. Improve your future Relics.

flavor: More of a 'Painted Stranger' if you ask me.
name: Sketchy Stranger
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret from another class.

flavor: Business is slow since the anima shortage began. Things just don't get stained like they used to!
howToEarnGolden: Earnable on the Murder at Castle Nathria Reward Track.
name: Steamcleaner
text: Battlecry: Destroy ALL cards in both players' decks that didn't start there.

flavor: Party guests never tip as well as the patrons in Bob's tavern.
name: Muckborn Servant
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Paladin card.

flavor: The bell tolls for us! Waiter, we need more water!
name: Service Bell
text: Discover a Class card from your deck and draw all copies of it.

flavor: Never send to know for whom the bell tolls.
name: Divine Toll
text:
[x]Shoot 5 rays at random
minions. They give friendly
minions +2/+2, and deal $2
damage to enemy minions.

flavor: 3 Legendary Invitations, AH AH AH!
name: The Countess
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 3 Legendary Invitations to your hand.

flavor: If this dinner party goes well, she thinks she has a good shot at being on Fel's Kitchen.
name: Sinful Sous Chef
text: Deathrattle: Add 2 Silver Hand Recruits to your hand.

flavor: How many bites does it take to get the center of an hors d'oeuvre?
name: Stewart the Steward
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give the next Silver Hand Recruit you summon +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.

flavor: "Funnel cakes? I haven't had those in years…"
name: Priest of the Deceased
text: Taunt Infuse (3): Gain +2/+2.

flavor: The best part of Murlocula is when he said "IT'S MRRGLIN' TIME" and totally mrrgled those guys.
name: Murlocula
text: Lifesteal Infuse (4): This costs (0).

flavor: "Look, I just want to know what kind of monster put raisins in this."
name: Buffet Biggun
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two Silver Hand Recruits. Infuse (3): Give them +2 Attack and Divine Shield.

flavor: Some people take their secrets to the grave.
name: Ghastly Gravedigger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, choose a card in your opponent's hand to  shuffle into their deck.

flavor: "The castle was nice but the fireplaces were too small - 2/5 stars"
name: Ashen Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Whenever your opponent draws a card next turn, they take 2 damage.

flavor: "I heard the Sire invited a Murloc! How dreadful!"
name: Elitist Snob
text: [x]Battlecry: For each Paladin card in your hand, randomly gain Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Rush, or Taunt.

flavor: It's fabulous! It's grand! It's, well it's really very nice.
name: Great Hall
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.

flavor: There may not be any skeletons in the closets at Castle Nathria, but there sure are souls in the basement.
name: Sanguine Depths
text:
[x]Deal 1 damage to a 
minion and give it 
+2 Attack.
